languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендриты{/g} Паскаля молниеносно приходят в боевое состояние, а {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} гневно хрипит:{/n} "Фиксирую жесточайшее нарушение протокола чистоты! Благословенный Амарнат находится в плену еретиков и подвергается истязанию!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендриты{/g} Паскаля молниеносно приходят в боевое состояние, а {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} гневно хрипит:{/n} "Фиксирую жесточайшее нарушение протокола чистоты! Благословенный Амарнат находится в плену еретиков и подвергается истязанию!"

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендриты{/g} Паскаля молниеносно приходят в боевое состояние, а {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} гневно хрипит:{/n} "Фиксирую жесточайшее нарушение протокола чистоты! Благословенный Амарнат находится в плену еретиков и подвергается истязанию!"

The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

{n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

languages.text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} springen sofort in den Kampfmodus, und ein zorniges Rasseln ertönt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}:{/n} "Ich registriere einen schweren Verstoß gegen das Reinheitsprotokoll! Der gesegnete Amarnat wurde von Ketzern gefangen genommen und wird gefoltert!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} springen sofort in den Kampfmodus, und ein zorniges Rasseln ertönt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}:{/n} "Ich registriere einen schweren Verstoß gegen das Reinheitsprotokoll! Der gesegnete Amarnat wurde von Ketzern gefangen genommen und wird gefoltert!"

languages.text: {n}Les {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} de Pasqal se mettent instantanément en mode combat, et vous entendez son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} émettre un cliquetis de colère :{/n} « Je détecte une grave transgression du protocole de pureté ! Amarnat le béni a été capturé par des hérétiques qui le soumettent à la torture ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} de Pasqal se mettent instantanément en mode combat, et vous entendez son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} émettre un cliquetis de colère :{/n} « Je détecte une grave transgression du protocole de pureté ! Amarnat le béni a été capturé par des hérétiques qui le soumettent à la torture ! »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}立即进入了战斗模式，{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发出了愤怒的嗡鸣。{/n}“检测到严重违反纯洁协议的行为！蒙福者阿玛纳特遭到异端分子俘虏，正在遭受折磨！”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}立即进入了战斗模式，{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发出了愤怒的嗡鸣。{/n}“记录到严重违反纯洁协议的行为！蒙福者阿玛纳特遭到异端分子俘虏，正在遭受折磨！”

languages.text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は瞬時に戦闘モードに入り、怒りからカタカタと震えるような音が彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から響いた。{/n}「浄化プロトコルの重大違反を登録する！祝福されたアマルナトは異端者に捕らえられ、拷問を受けている！」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}はバッと戦闘モードに入って、怒りでガタガタ震える音が彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から響いた。{/n}「浄化プロトコルの重大違反を登録する！祝福されたアマルナトは異端者に捕らえられて、拷問を受けている！」

languages.text: {n}Las {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} de Pasqal se ponen en modo de combate al instante y de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} sale un sonido iracundo.{/n} «¡Estoy registrando una grave violación del protocolo de pureza! ¡El bendito Amarnat ha sido capturado por herejes y está siendo torturado!».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Las {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} de Pasqal se ponen en modo de combate al instante y de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} sale un sonido iracundo.{/n} «¡Estoy registrando una grave violación del protocolo de pureza! ¡El bendito Amarnat ha sido capturado por herejes y está siendo torturado!».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritleri{/g} bir anda çatışma moduna geçiyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} öfkeli bir takırtı yayılıyor.{/n} "Saflık protokolüne yapılan ciddi bir ihlal kaydediyorum! Kâfirler, kutsanmış Amarnat'ı kaçırmış, ona işkence ediyorlar!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} spring into combat mode instantly, and a wrathful rattle comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "I am registering a severe violation of the purity protocol! The blessed Amarnat has been captured by heretics and is being tortured!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}leri anında çatışma moduna geçiyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}undan öfkeli bir takırtı yayılıyor.{/n} "Saflık protokolünün ciddi derecede ihlal edildiğini kayda geçiriyorum! Kâfirler, kutsanmış Amarnat'ı kaçırmış, ona işkence yapıyorlar!"
